name: High Crime Alert
title: Most Dangerous Place for Men
description: In 2021, Jamaica recorded an alarming rate of 95.6 intentional homicides per 100,000 males, making it one of the most dangerous places for men globally.

name: Safety Concerns
title: High Homicide Rate
description: Jamaica reported 52.1 intentional homicides per 100,000 people in 2021, highlighting significant safety concerns for its citizens.
